Module chav1961.purelib
Package chav1961.purelib.ui.swing.useful

Class JTextPaneHighlighter<LexemaType>

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.text.JTextComponent
javax.swing.JEditorPane
javax.swing.JTextPane
chav1961.purelib.ui.swing.useful.JTextPaneHighlighter<LexemaType>
Type Parameters:
LexemaType - any marker for the text pieces. It's strongly recommended to use enumerations for it
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable
Direct Known Subclasses:
JCreoleEditor
public abstract class JTextPaneHighlighter<LexemaType>
extends javax.swing.JTextPane

This is a simple syntax highlighter for the Swing applications. Use it instead of JTextPane component where you wish.

This class is not thread-safe

Since:
0.0.3
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
See Also:
CreoleWriter, Serialized Form
